extendedInfo.description: Play through world famous PGA TOUR courses with the all-new Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 12 and see how you stack up with real PGA PROS, including Tiger Woods himself!(NOTE: May not work on rooted devices)EXPERIENCE THE PGA TOUR LIKE A PROâ¦â¢ Choose your course and golfer, and play against other scores in PGA TOUR modeâ¢ Take on the Tiger Challenge, consisting of over 20 mini-games designed to test your skills -- earn money that can be used to participate in PGA TOUR events.â¢ Play through PGA TOUR courses, including Pebble Beach, St. Andrews, TPC Sawgrass, Hazeltine, Doral, TPC Boston, and Greenbrierâ¢ Play as or alongside 8 pros, including Tiger Woods, Anthony Kim, Paula Creamer, Natalie Gulbis, Paul Casey, Jim  Furyk, Zach Johnson, Camilo Villegasâ¢ Customize your male or female golfer with skin, shirt, pants, hat, shoes, belts, and glovesâ¢ Play the all-new Predator fantasy courseâ¢ Play in 4 Game ModesSEE & FEEL THE SENSATION OF THE PGA TOUR Soak in the feeling of standing on the worldâs finest fairways. Smoother and more precise touch controls let you attack the greens and sink that clutch birdie putt in winning style.Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Best play store game out
reviews.comment: Completely eats battery but Def THE BEST PLAY STORE GAME I\'VE DOWNLOADED. Better play than gta even. Don\'t listen to the haters.
reviews.author: Chris Warkenton

reviews.title: One of the best golf games I have ever played on any platform.
reviews.comment: Earn money and upgrade your equipment. Power, accuracy and spin really help.
reviews.author: Timonator T Renehan

reviews.title: Will not download.
reviews.comment: Tried WiFi, 3g and 4g get the same error every time, server error 5002. Can\'t play because I can\'t download the game files. Past Google\'s refund period so stuck with a game that doesn\'t even think about working. Come on EA make there isn\'t a limit on file size in the play store make the play store file the full size of the game.... late galaxy nexus 4.1.2
reviews.author: jon frances

reviews.title: Overall good.
reviews.comment: I play the game on iPad also.  The swing meter is too small on left or right on phone. It should be a large meter in the center (like the iPad)  Hard to execute shot properly.  Also.  No points awarded for many shots.  Long distance.  Close approach.  Points needed to upgrade golfer.  Please fix. Since I payed for it, I\'d figure I\'d critique it properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Rudamentry graphics and an unbelievable inconsistent game play. Try making the game fair next time. The commentary also is very redundant with maybe 5 different sayings in total. Not worth the money. Wish the refund was good for longer than it takes to download the 300+ mb of extra files to even start the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Galaxy S2 -  Game it self is ok.  Expect more out of EA Games.  The crashes that reset your profile and progress make it worthless.  Uninstalling after 3 days.  PLEASE REFUND!!!
reviews.author: Ryan Wheeler

reviews.title: iPhone way better
reviews.comment: The graphics on this game are terrible compared to Apple\'s iPhone. Not smooth, takes forever to load. Very disappointed that I actually paid for this crap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot download.
reviews.comment: Three days trying to download over wifi. Still cannot get past 35% on the 300+ mb post install download. Installed multiple times but nothing changes. Very disappointing. Cannot comment on game play at all. Droid RAZR HD Maxx.
reviews.author: Scott Andrus

reviews.title: Would be the best game but...
reviews.comment: I think online multiplayer matches should be a feature. What good is golf if you can\'t beat your friends?
reviews.author: Curtis Rabon

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: Says it is updating (after 30 minutes of updating) and screen goes black.  Wonderful...
reviews.author: Mr. Monroe

reviews.title: Crashes (too)
reviews.comment: In the last 3 days my profile has been completely wiped and all of my progress erased. Waste of time because I have had to start all over from the VERY BEGINNING each time. Please fix. I love the game otherwise and want to keep it. But only because I want to improve my stats and get better. Dont want to play as a rookie every 1-1/2 days.
reviews.author: Kristi Callison

reviews.title: Blows on Android
reviews.comment: This is the second time I\'ve tried thus game,I thought I\'d give it another shot on my s3, fact is it just sucks on Android. Swing meter too hard to see and gage, locks up constantly.
reviews.author: David Real

reviews.title: Tiger Woods yall
reviews.comment: Its tiger on android. Runs great on my epic 4g touch and t989 s2\'s Even plays on my sk4g. Online play would make it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the heck
reviews.comment: After playing this game with enjoyment for the past month today all my player stats just dropped. Over $500k in winnings, handicap down to 0 and all my club upgrades all gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Takes forever to download
reviews.comment: It sticks at 85%. Who were the idiots who coded this game. They should work for Microsoft and resurrect VisiOn.  I need to be a Timelord and use a Tardis to see it through to the end.
reviews.author: Carlos Clavijo

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Very annoyed.  Finally got Tiger Woods.  Installed on my galaxy nexus & nexus 7.  Doesn\'t work on either device and refund period expired before extra content was finished loading to devices.  A waste of $5.00.  Hopefully there will be an update for the nexus 7 soon.  Frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TW2012
reviews.comment: I have had to download this game three time now because it keeps crashing. When it works I really like it. Wish they would come out with newt version.
reviews.author: Kristy Cisneroz

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: The game needs some work. First off the controls are poor in that you don\'t hit it straight half of the time even when you think you did. Also it\'s annoying when you\'re putting from far away with low putting upgrades and you can\'t see the Max distance of the putter, so it becomes guesswork unlike the console versions at least the older ps2 ones.   And add some multi player feature.
reviews.author: Sheridan Williams

reviews.title: Dang it
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t say anything about needing additional memory. Can\'t play it because I don\'t have enough room. Should of known better with an EA game
reviews.author: Mitch Rasmussen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Downloaded to pay on my Galaxy Note 10.1, but says it isn\'t compatible..... Like this game as I have it on my PS3, but they\'re making things difficult for me.  Is they\'re an update coming to make this tablet compatible?
reviews.author: Jae Cee Rooks
